questions.question: Which of the following is a tribasic acid?

explanations.a: Acetic acid is monobasic, as it has only one replaceable hydrogen.
explanations.b: Phosphoric acid is tribasic because it has three replaceable hydrogen atoms.

answers.a: Light that passes through the substance
answers.b: Light given off by the substance
answers.c: Change in wave length of light by the substance
answers.d: Light that is fluoresced by the substance

explanations.a: Correct – A colorimeter measures the amount of light transmitted through a solution.
explanations.c: Incorrect – Wavelength change is not what colorimeters detect.
